sentences.sContent: a report by experts convened by the National Institutes of Health
sentences.sCn: 由全国健康协会召集的专家提出的一份报告

remMethod.val: con(共同) + ven(来) + e → 来到一起 → 召集； 聚集

trans.tranCn: 召集， 召开； 聚集， 集合
trans.tranOther: if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
